benchmark_details.name: DIVKNOW QA
benchmark_details.overview: DIVKNOW QA is a novel fact-centric multi-hop question-answering benchmark that requires models to utilize heterogeneous knowledge sources equitably to answer a question. It assesses the reasoning ability of LLMs via jointly exploiting open-domain QA over heterogeneous knowledge sources.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate the proficiency of question-answering systems, especially those enhanced by retrieval tools, in addressing knowledge-intensive questions with a strong emphasis on multi-hop multi-source retrieval.

data.source: Curated dataset with human-annotated examples linked to knowledge sources.
data.annotation: Created using a combination of automatic generation through predefined reasoning chains and human annotation.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated by comparing model predictions to the ground truth answers.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better performance in correctly answering multi-hop questions.
methodology.baseline_results: Comparative results with existing models showed significant improvements.
methodology.validation: The benchmark was validated through human annotation and verification.
